item.title: Feature Film: The Library Boys
item.description: A coming of age feature film about three best friends surviving their last year of high school

item.title: TV: By Design
item.description: Theme and background music for the By Design series of TV shows

item.title: Short Film: Sammy The Salmon
item.description: Sammy The Salmon follows the story of a closeted gay man who with the help of a talking salmon, navigates his complicated love life. This film is in equal parts whimsical, hilarious, thoughtful and moving.

item.title: City Of Melbourne's Christmas Festivals
item.description: Giant Christmas Tree, 10’s of thousands of lights, and a 24 Channel spatial audio system. What more could you want for Christmas?

item.title: Theatre: Everyone Is Famous
item.description: “Looking at persona in the age of social media, nine young folk wade through the wasteland of the internet to find themselves”

item.title: AD: AKU, Never Ordinary
item.description: Working with alongside DOP Hossein Kohdabandehloo and Producer Chris Luscri, I created a hard hitting, Trap and Hip Hop inspired piece for the young and energetic sports brand AKU.

item.title: Bobby Bége
item.description: Pet project of Marlon Grunden and Bradley Price, Bobby Bége is a disco infused electronic duo from Melbourne Australia

item.title: Mix and Master: Mind Funk by pastels
Mix: Looking Back by pastels
item.description: Pastels Lo-Fi track “looking Back” for 823 Records’ “All Things Considered, Vol. 1” compilation

item.title: Short Film: Back Burn
item.description: On the anniversary of an Easter car crash that took the lives of both of her parents, an emotionally distant teenage girl in the Australian Outback is encumbered with the responsibility of looking after her elderly grandfather, who suffers from signs of dementia.

item.title: Theatre: Dark Web Mystery Box
item.description: Songs and Sketches for Max Paton’s Comedy show, Dark Web Mystery Box
